column4: alan_s,i have ~/Desktop folder that represent content of my work space(Desktop)/ i need to change ~/Desktop to ~/HOHOHO. what file i need to edit for change it
just a stab in the dark but could you use a link to do this?
and then just call the link Desktop
back up everything before you try it. but you could create your HOHOHO folder move everything from Desktop to HOHOHO delete Desktop then create a link to HOHOHO and call it Desktop
